resources.string: Lists of artists, albums, playlists and podcasts
The challenge here is to list in different categories in such a way the layout doesn\'t get visually polluted

One way to overcome the challenge is to show artists, albums, playlists and podcasts as tabs and, in each one, show reccomendations as horizontal scrollable lists, with a header that leads to the search. The title of the app should always redirect to the MainActivity.
This activity must show a representative image of the album and information about the song/interpreter/album.

The layout should be as clean as possible, with a horizontal layout on the top, containing an image to the left and a summary on the right. Under the image, there should be buttons, like PLAY and BUY. Below the summary layout, there should be more details (ability to scroll down).
This activity must show the song that\'s being played currently.
The layout have a larger picture of the album, with media controls under it (play, pause and so on). At the bottom, there should be a short summary of the song/album/artist.
This activity must allow the user to search songs stored in the device or in the cloud. The challenge is to have a clean layout and rich search options.

At the top, there should be a search bar allowing to find by text or voice. When activated, a small layout must be exhibited allowing the user to choose the criteria(s) - author, song, style. The results are shown bellow, divided in two sections - songs the user purchased and new ones. In each song, there must be buttons to play, purchase or to show details.
This activity must allow the user to search songs in the cloud. The challenge is to have a clean layout and rich search options.

At the top, there should be a search bar allowing to find by text or voice. When activated, a small layout must be exhibited allowing the user to choose the criteria(s) - author, song, style. The results are shown bellow and in each song there must be buttons to play a snippet, purchase or to show details.
